page.title: 10Religion
page.content: In Bethlehem there is only one place of worship and that is the Independont chapel called Bethlehem.Many things take place in the chapel every year. Each Sunday afternoon I go to Sunday School with mmany of my friends. We learn new songs,read from the bible and draw pictures.During the autumn the children aged from 4-13 take part in a Harvest Thanksgiving evening.In preporation for our Chrismas play we practise during the evening.We enjoy Chrismas time because we have a Sunday School party where we eat well and sing.We only speak Welsh at Sunday School.Other things that we do is we go on a summer trip, we also take part in the "Eisteddfod" and a religious exam.
